root: ^Sometimes you wont always have healing items.
^In that case, you can choose to have a CLERIC on your team, they are a healer.
^Instead of attacking they can heal characters close to them for 4 points of health.
^Go find your cleric and heal up one of your other characters, by clicking on the ATTACK button and then any character that is on a highlighted tile.
^Make sure to end your turn when you're done
